moves.1. e4:
Had to annotate this one though my skills for annotation aren't the best my other annotation was more for humor than value but this was an interesting game in a mini tournament.  I recovered and won after blundering a great opportunity early on to get the queen.
I welcome all comments.
moves.1... e5: Book so far but I prefer queen's pawn open
moves.2. h4: I thought this was an odd move but computer gave it +.4
moves.2... Nf6: I thought my move was book I got +.34?
moves.3. Qf3: Computer said this was an innacuracy.
moves.3... Bc5 4. a4: Again I think the rook pawn is odd at this stage
moves.7... Nf6: I moved back for homeland security computer called it a mistake -loss of tempo I suppose.
moves.9... Nh5: I begin my attack on the Queen
moves.10... Ndf6: Considered it but had another notion.
moves.11. Nd2: Computer said this was a Blunder the first of the game but not the last and I would make some of my own.  b4 was best according to game computer
moves.11... h6: Having calculated all his possible Queen moves and feeling confident I boldly declared: "The Queen is dead"
moves.12. Bxf7+: but I forgot about his Bishop!
moves.12... Kh8:
I got my first Blunder and I think it should be called an Uber Blunder ugggggg.  Shanehill my opponent correctly pointed
out I could have got the queen by taking the Bishop with my King!!! But I was focused on taking it with the Rook and how that failed because it gave him
g6 to go to so I got flustered and moved the king argghhh (picture charlie brown when lucy takes the football away)
moves.13... Qe7: Now the computer called this a mistake but it was key to my recovery
moves.14. Bb3: He also got a mistake but he saved the queen and killed a pawn
moves.14... Nf4: I got a blunder here but it was a calculated move.
moves.16. d4: uh oh ..um can I get two moves please?
moves.18... g6: Now the Queen is truly dead time for a funeral and....
moves.19. Qxh6+ Nxh6: burial. now about that king of yours
moves.20. h5 dxe5: I should have saved the bishop here.
moves.21. O-O: Blunder for him he should have killed the Bishop.
moves.23... Qe2: I get my own Blunder I think its #3 but I disagree with that this leads to mate
moves.25. Rae1: Oo scary but easily dealt with by a forcing move
moves.27. Kh1 Qxe1#: two.  I was focused on the queen kill in this one by missing the opportunity but it lead to an easy endgame.

gameName: porcho's mini-tournament VII the queen is dead...almost
